summary: 调用ResendEmailVerification接口重新发送验证邮件。

schema.description:
接口返回错误信息语言。取值：
- **zh**：中文。
- **en**：英文。

默认值为**en**。
待重新获取验证邮件的邮箱，多个邮箱之间使用英文逗号（,）隔开。

SuccessList.description: 验证邮件发送成功列表。

FailList.description: 验证邮件发送失败列表。

Message.example: The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "RequestId": "0EA54E99-DB48-4CE3-A099-6ED8E451B8AC", "SuccessList": [ { "Code": "Success", "Message": "Success", "Email": "test2@aliyun.com" } ], "FailList": [ { "Code": "SendTokenQuotaExceeded", "Message": "The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded.", "Email": "test1@aliyun.com" } ] }","errorExample":"{ "failList": [ { "code": "SendTokenQuotaExceeded", "email": "test1@aliyun.com", "message": "The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded." }, { "code": "ParameterIllegall", "email": "test2@aliyun.com", "message": "Parameter error" } ], "requestId": "8D93B5EC-09D5-43C3-A5ED-AFBC6A98DDDF", "successList": [] }"},{"type":"xml","example":" SendTokenQuotaExceeded test1@aliyun.com The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded. ParameterIllegall test2@aliyun.com Parameter error 0EA54E99-DB48-4CE3-A099-6ED8E451B8AC ","errorExample":" test1@aliyun.com The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded. SendTokenQuotaExceeded test2@aliyun.com The maximum number of attempts allowed to send the email verification link is exceeded. SendTokenQuotaExceeded 0EA54E99-DB48-4CE3-A099-6ED8E451B8AC "}]
title: 重新发送验证邮件
